## 6th Annual Financial Engineering Colloquium: Artificial Intelligence in Finance

- **When**: Friday, November 16, 2018 
- **Where**: Illini Center, 200 South Wacker Drive
- **Time**: 10:30 a.m. - 2:30 p.m.

 
Confirmed Speakers Include:

- Dr. Inderdeep Singh, AI in Derivative Markets 
- Dr. Matthew Dixon, Equity Factor Modelling with ML 
- Dr. Satya Dharanipragada, Algo Trading using DA & AI a personal viewpoint  
- Dr. Mao Ye, Big Data in Finance 


The event is complimentary but registration is required

https://forms.illinois.edu/sec/3698221
